𒂗𒈾𒄷 ˢen-na-ḫu senile senior "old and dilapidated"

dilapi'arum seniore old and dilapidated

7: 𒂗 ˢen senator [senior](senior.html) 𒇽 𒋾 𒁹𒎗𒎌 sanuti® (𒊺=>𒎗)
